recipe_name: Baked pear with mint, feta and honey
author: Garrey Dawson
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. Place the pear slices onto a baking sheet, top with the feta and drizzle with olive oil. Place into the oven to bake for 6-8 minutes, or until tender and golden-brown.  Remove the pears from the oven, transfer onto a serving plate and drizzle over the honey. Garnish with the mint sprig, and serve.
ingredients: 1 pear, cored, topped and tailed, thickly sliced,  55g/2oz feta, crumbled,  olive oil,  1 tbsp honey,  fresh mint sprig, to garnish
